summary: This file just changes the armor Fluffy Travel Attire by Kalilies into a cloth variant for mage users.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=red]This mod has been uploaded with direct permission from the original mod author Kalilies.[/color][/b][/center]
Greetings! I noticed a lot of people of the Travel Attire mod page were asking about a cloth version for pure mage users, so I contacted Kalilies about making one to share. 

[b][u]Changes:[/u][/b]
The armor is still crafted at the forge.
No perks required.
Cloth variant.
The vest now requires a bit of linen instead of leather.
The armor can be enchanted as normal.

Kalilies' original mod is required http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53518/?
[b](Endorse their mod, not this one)[/b]

[color=red]// Important Note from the Original Mod Page \\[/color]

- The Dawnguard DLC is required, or else you will having missing textures in first person!
- The outfit is meant to be worn together, so only equipping the chest piece will lead to missing body parts (hands gaps and missing legs). Too lazy to fix that, sorry.

Credits:
Kalilies for the lovely original mod

Credits mention on the original mod authors page:
L0rdOfWar and FranklinZunge - for the vest (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51813/?)
Ashara and anka01 - for the pants (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48652/?)
Elleh - for the boots (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52667/?)
FrankFamily - for the gauntlet textures (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42404/?)
Azraille - for the fur (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52407/?)
author: Ero
